blueprint_book.label: [font=count-font][color=cyan]Solar Hyper- modular[/color][/font]
blueprint_book.description:
14x14 grid (1/3 of regular rail)
Integrates well with other rail blueprints (needs adapter for diagonal)
(try to) keep long enough distances between intersections to fit a full train (this applies to all rail. It's just easier to mess up here due to the small grid)

Some medium power poles are used to block/remove undesired signals from overlapping blueprints
